title: Practice Tool
body:
Hey everyone,

Recently a friend of mine decided that we should have a 1 v 1 on the practice tool just for fun. This way we could have all the gold and experience we would need to go straight to Lv. 18 and full build. Unfortunately, we discovered that you can't invite friends onto the practice tool.

So, I'm just wondering if there are any plans for the future that I've missed allowing players to invite their friends or if it will be a new change in the near future. I'd be really interested in hearing your thoughts and opinions about this topic. Thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

Unfortunately at this point no, the practice tool is primarily a single player tool and development is focused toward this.
https://i.gyazo.com/8289f2bafba80a08fbf901abe63528fa.png
